name: Incandescent 2
description:
Incandescent 2 is bigger and better than the original. Take your ship and shoot all the many enemies that will attack you.
Features multiple difficulty modes and new enemies to face.

Features:
- Fast paced arcade action in many bright colours.
- You can use a controller or mouse and keyboard.
- Supports 720p, 1080p and 1440p.
- Online leaderboards for each difficulty. How do you rate against your friends?

All the colourful enemies are back and they need to be destroyed!
